events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived and the tracking info hasn’t updated for days.
The customer's issue was identified as a delivery delay based on their message about late shipment and tracking problems.
The support case was assigned to a delivery specialist to address the delayed shipment complaint.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand your package has not yet arrived, and I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the current status for you?
Sure, the order number is #123456 and the shipping address is 789 Elm Street, Springfield.
After checking, it appears the package was delayed due to weather issues but is now out for delivery and should arrive within two days.
Thanks for the update. I appreciate knowing when to expect it and will wait for it to arrive.
I’m glad to confirm your order is now on its way with expected delivery soon. Please contact us if you need further help.
Just checking in to see if your package was delivered successfully and if everything is satisfactory with your order.
Since the delivery was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you.
